Description:
An entertainers delight with stylish finishes!
A lifestyle of luxury awaits you in this contemporary home, offering an inviting single level design with four spacious bedrooms, two living spaces and a spectacular outdoor entertaining area. In a desirable location 2km to Leopold shopping complex, short drive to the Bellarine Peninsula, and 10 mins to Geelong CBD. All you need to do is move in and enjoy!
Kitchen Island bench, subway tile splashback, 900mm gas cooktop, oven & rangehood, stone benchtops, overhead wine storage, walk in pantry, feature track lighting & down lights, stainless steel appliances
Living open plan adjoining living, kitchen & dining, timber laminate flooring, split system air con, glass sliding doors open to outdoor alfresco deck, well lit with natural light
Second living secluded home theatre set up, carpeted, wooden feature wine rack, down lights, ducted heating
Master bedroom ceiling fan, carpeted, down lights, roller blinds, walk in robe, ensuite with fully tiled shower, large vanity & toilet
Minor bedrooms carpeted, ceiling fans, roller blinds, window curtains in third bedroom/nursey room, BIRs
Main bathroom large vanity, deep bath, shower & separate toilet
Outdoor undercover alfresco deck with downlights & ceiling fans, outdoor built in BBQ & wine fridge, wall mounted television, exterior roller blinds, very large backyard, garden shed and side access
Mod cons ducted heating throughout, ceiling fans throughout all bedrooms, laundry with side house access, double lock up garage with external and side of house access
Ideal for: social families, First Home Buyers, families, downsizers and investors
Close by local facilities: Leopold Shopping Centre, Bunnings, Child Care Centre, sporting ovals, local walking trails & playgrounds.
** PHOTO ID MUST BE SHOWN TO ATTEND ALL INSPECTIONS **

Description:
6 bedrooms, 1429sqm allotment
If you are searching for a spacious family home on a large allotment, then look no further. This quality built home of approx 40sq zoned living space has it all.
Situated in one of the best streets in Leopold, the wide entrance hallway accesses a formal lounge/dining room and study at the front of the home. There is a large, light filled open plan kitchen/dining/family area with a Coonara wood heater which would undoubtedly be the central hub for all the family to gather. The stunning handmade solid timber kitchen provides plenty of cupboard and bench space, stainless steel gas cooktop and electric oven, dishwasher and large pantry. This area overlooks the side and rear yard, making it easy to keep an eye on children playing outdoors whilst cooking dinner or relaxing inside.
Towards the rear of the home are the 6 bedrooms, 5 with built in robes, master with ensuite and walk in robe. There is a third living area adjoining these bedrooms, making the ideal teenager's or parent's retreat. The family bathroom offers a separate bath, shower and toilet. There is a third toilet and shower adjacent to the large laundry.
Extras include zoned ducted heating and evaporative cooling for all year comfort, alarm system, gorgeous ceiling roses and plenty of storage cupboards throughout.
Outdoors is a generous and secure lawn area with cubby house and room for a pool if the need arises, undercover entertaining area, established fruit trees, two storage sheds, a second private entertaining area with pergola and a remote controlled double garage with internal access.
Don't overlook this home, it truly has it all. Make a time to inspect and we are sure you will be highly impressed at the quality, immaculate presentation and all the highlights this home has to offer.

Description:
Million Dollar Views, Entry Level Buying!
Located in a highly sought-after yet tightly held pocket of Clifton Springs, this solid brick custom build will exceed all expectations! Offering sublime Bay views from almost all areas of the home and within an easy stroll to the waters edge, this is Bellarine living at it's best!
A high and secure front fence offers the utmost privacy, where you're welcomed to a well-manicured, low maintenance garden. The grand front entry offers stairs to the upper level, where you're welcomed by a separate and expansive lounge area, with versatile use for an adjoining formal dining/study nook. A fully equipped kitchen offers gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher, butlers' hutch and walk-in-pantry, while overlooking the open plan dining and 2nd living area all while encompassing the stunning Bay views. Cleverly zoned, the 3 bedrooms sit at the rear wing, with bedrooms 2 and 3 offering built in robes and the master with walk-in-robe, additional built-in-robes and views of the Bay and Beacon Point Reserve. The central bathroom offers 2-way access from the master, is equipped with a large vanity, bath and over-sized shower, while a 2nd separate powder room and laundry with sewing nook completes this neat as a pin package.
Outside offers a mature and established garden, with an undercover entertaining area and verandah boasting the perfect place to sit, read a book and enjoy the Bay! The DLUG offers internal and rear access, with plenty of room for additional cars, trailers, boats and all toys in between!
Additional features includes; Ducted vacuum, gas heaters in both living areas, split system heating and cooling, alarm system and access to under house storage
Offering that dream Bellarine lifestyle that so many are seeking, you are flanked for choice with this location. Moments to the Bay, Boat Ramp, Golf Club and public transport, and with all major shopping amenities, schools, wineries and cafes at your fingertips. The perfect holiday home, downsizer, investment or first home, this ticks all the boxes!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
AN ACRE OF COUNTRY LIVING WITH ENDLESS OPPORTUNITY
Set on 4050m2 approx in tightly held Moolap, this 3 bed, 2 bath, 2 living solid brick property is a blank canvas ready to be transformed. Built early 1970's on solid concrete stumps this wonderfully loved home is situated less than 5 mins drive to Geelong CBD and would suit a growing family with room to move, or a business with ample shedding and storage possibilities.
Comprising of a neat entry and spacious front formal living room with solid hardwood floors and wonderful natural light.
There is also 2 front bedrooms equipped with BIR, blockout blinds and front garden outlooks.
The main hub of the home is the central Main living room, equipped with solid hardwood floors, with exposed brick wall and North facing windows with a lovely courtyard outlook. There is also a central bathroom to service the two front bedrooms, offering a compact bath, vanity storage and separate toilet.
Towards the rear of the home you will find the Master bedroom with WIR and handy ensuite needing some TLC. Plus a spacious functional kitchen/meals with seating up to 6 and features laminate benchtops, St George oven, Westinghouse 4 burner electric cooktop and ample cupboard space.
Outside is where the dreams start with a full blank canvas boasting an array of options. Currently you will find a powered DLUG (6 x 7m) off the home and an additional large 4 car garage/work shed (6 x 14m) with side entry and single carport attached.
This fantastic blank canvas lifestyle property is ideally located 2 mins drive to nearby shops, 15 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula and less than 5 mins drive to Geelong CBD and waterfront.
FEATURES
-4050m2 with Res Zoning
-Ducted heating
- AC
-Septic tank
-NBN available - Gas available

Description:
STUNNING WATERFRONT VIEWS!
The north facing aspect of this home enjoys stunning water views of Corio Bay, Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs from the open plan living area and front deck of this fabulous waterfront home in the tightly held Edgewater Drive, Clifton Springs.
This brilliant 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom family home on a 620m2 approx parcel of land features raked timber ceilings and a functional, practical floorplan with split system heating/cooling and ducted heating for year round comfort. The uninterrupted views of Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs are breathtaking and you will enjoy feeling like you are always on holiday having the option of swimming in the privacy of your own backyard or in the pristine waters of the beach just across the road!
A delightfully maintained garden and a double garage for the storage of a boat or cars are a welcome addition to the home perfect for someone wanting to get a position on the water!

Description:
No Stone Left Unturned!
Located deep in the heart of Leopolds prestigious Kensington Estate. This stunning, single- level residence will exceed all expectations with its outstanding quality and finishes. Located only moments from the ever-growing Gateway Plaza with all your daily needs at your fingertips.
The moment you step through the door, you will be instantly impressed with the high ceilings and grand hallway. The practical floor plan is intelligent by way of its design, keeping family and functional daily living in mind. Offering four spacious bedrooms, two bathrooms and two separate living areas, this home is sure to surpass your anticipations.
The grand master suite, located at the front of the home, creates a sense of luxury. With a walk-through robe, as well as built in robes, a stunning ensuite and floor to ceiling linen drapes. The remaining three bedrooms provide ample accommodation, all consisting of large built in robes and serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
The open plan, fully appointed kitchen has it all. Offering all stainless-steel appliances, gas cooktop, dishwasher, walk in pantry/ appliance cupboard and stone bench tops that overlook an expansive living and meals area. Adjoining the living area is the magnificent enclosed entertaining area bathed in natural sunlight and acting as a relaxing sun room. Completing the floorplan inside is the formal lounge room perfect for the kids to enjoy, the tucked away study nook and the full laundry with external access.
On the outside there is very little do, a great sized backyard that is low maintenance and practical for everyday use, as well as the addition of possible side access for storage of a boat, caravan or trailer.
Further features include, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system air conditioners, water tank, garden shed for extra storage, security cameras and alarm system, and remote double garage with internal access. No detail has been overlooked and quality is evident from every angle, home likes this dont come along every day so be quick to inspect as this will not last long.

Description:
MODERN APPEAL WITH BAY VIEWS
This newly built modern home represents fantastic low maintenance living suitable for those looking to spend their time enjoying all the fabulous things that the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula has to offer including walking trails, pristine beaches and award winning wineries.
Downstairs comprises 2 bedrooms, a beautiful bathroom, laundry and sitting room leading out to a sunny courtyard whilst upstairs features a third bedroom and delightful kitchen, living & dining area with spectacular views of the bay, this really is the perfect opportunity to secure a brand new home suitable for weekend getaways or permanent living in a highly regarded pocket of Clifton Springs!

Description:
SUPERBLY SPACIOUS SPLIT LEVEL
With an abundance of style and plenty of space, this beautiful property is newly built and completed with attention to detail and ready to be called home. Featuring a superb split level floorplan making the most of approx. 586m2 parcel of land over three levels, this fabulous new home comprises four bedrooms all with BIR and Master suite with WIR & ensuite plus two separate living zones, both with expansive entertaining balconies providing ample room for the whole family as well as allowing privacy for quiet enjoyment. The upper level of the home features a stunning designer kitchen with an abundance of storage & quality fixtures and flows effortlessly to the dining and living space and opens out to a fantastic entertainers balcony which enjoys scenic views of Clifton Springs and beyond. The entire home is kept comfortable all year round with ducted heating and split system cooling whilst the outside enjoys a low maintenance garden perfect for the kids to run around in and double garage accommodation with drive thru access to the rear. If you are seeking a brand new quality built home in a sought after pocket of Clifton Springs then this is the one for you! Call for an inspection today.

Description:
Lots Of Space To Grow
With the centre of town a short stroll away, this recently renovated Drysdale home has been given a new lease on life. On a generous corner allotment it has the capacity for a further makeover with an extension (STCA) or live comfortably as it is or secure as a tidy investment.
Upon entry is a l-shaped living and dining area with a kitchen equipped with a Fisher & Paykel dishwasher and stand alone oven. Outside is a large north-facing yard and deck that is ideal for entertaining and providing space for children and pets to play.
Follow the hallway to three good-size bedrooms, two with built-in robes, a modern central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Also attached to the property is a bungalow with possibilities for a home office, fourth bedroom or teenagers retreat.
There is a single lock-up garage and workshop to keep the handyperson happy and ample room for parking additional vehicles or trailers.
Walk to shops, schools, parks, cafes and amenities with easy access to the highway into Geelong. Book an inspection today!

Description:
Perfect Down Sizer
This delightful home is located just moments away from Public Transport, Leopold Shopping Centre, Playgrounds, as well as having access to both the Bellarine Peninsula & Geelong CBD on your doorstep. Situated on its own title with no fees, this opportunity is not to be missed for the savvy buyer, investor or downsizer.
Neatly presented and comprising of two bedrooms both with built in robes and a central shared bathroom with bath, shower and separate toilet. An open plan kitchen boasting a breakfast bar, tiled splash back, sufficient pantry, as well as all stainless-steel appliances. All of this is complementing the generous dining and lounge area which features split system heating/cooling to provide year-round comfort.
Large windows and a glass sliding door provide easy access to the low maintenance gardens and your private and secure courtyard. Ample off-street parking is provided with a single lock up garage.
Boasting privacy & security, you will be impressed with what this has to offer. An inspection will not disappoint!
Insights: 1/5 Jessie Way, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2019 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Settle in to Leisure and Lifestyle
There is a Zen like quality to this family friendly home in a quiet court location. From the subtle earthy décor to the 801sqm (approx) sunny landscaped gardens, the vibe is relaxed and welcoming. You will love the layout and the smart design that makes the most of the northerly aspect.
The master suite is positioned away from the main living zone and the three additional generously sized bedrooms. It is spacious and includes a walk in robe and en-suite. The nearby sitting room offers a quiet zone to wind down in and would make an ideal parents retreat away from the hustle of family life. The open plan living, kitchen and dining is the central hub of the home and this is where everyday living and entertaining happens with ease. A super functional kitchen boasts great storage and workspace, stainless appliances and a breakfast bar. There is effortless flow to sheltered outdoor living through large sliding doors, making BBQs and enjoying summer evenings with family and friends a breeze.
As well as an internal access double lock up garage, the property includes an extra freestanding double garage. This added bonus offers additional parking for the boat or trailer and it is perfect as a workshop or creative space while adding to the already generous storage options.
This desirable location is ideal for reaping the benefits of life on the Bellarine. Just a short commute to Geelong, it is also centrally placed for access to the fabulous rail trail, local shops, nature reserves, bay side and world-class ocean beaches as well as community and sporting facilities. Solid and low maintenance, this home is an obvious choice for anyone wanting leisure, lifestyle and peaceful family living.

Description:
Serene Estate
A lifestyle opportunity enabling you to thrive and prosper in an intimate residential estate. Residing in this enviable location offers a lifestyle of coastal living, the convenience of a large regional centre within a 20 minute drive and designed around a semi rural, close knit community with every convenience at your doorstep.
The peninsula location is renowned for the idyllic, outdoor lifestyle. Spend a day at the beach, go fishing or enjoy a glass of your favourite wine at one of our many local wineries. The Port Phillip Ferry sails twice daily from Portarlington to South Bank if you fancy a day trip to the city. You will ask yourself why you didn't make the move sooner.
Ground works to commence late 2018.
Selling fast, contact Rhonda Humpage 0457 313609

Description:
Family Living That Packs A Punch!
When it comes to easy family living, this home packs a punch! The outdoor entertaining area and swimming pool inspire outdoor family fun, while the location ensures youre never far from lifes conveniences!
Positioned just two doors down from the Myuna Reserve playground, young children will be in their element. A short walk will find you at the Ash Road shops, where you can enjoy a bite to eat or grab some groceries for dinner. Public transport and the Leopold Kindergarten are also within easy walking distance, while the Leopold Primary School is conveniently close by. Easy access to sporting grounds, the Gateway Plaza, and Leopold Community Centre is the icing on the cake.
Overlooking the front garden, the generous lounge creates a peaceful ambience and flows through to the versatile study nook. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry, breakfast bar, and appliances (LG dishwasher and Westinghouse wall oven, 900mm gas hob and canopy rangehood). The kitchen/meals zone, complete with speakers, opens onto the spacious outdoor entertaining area with BBQ setting the scene for many casual gatherings and fun-filled parties!
Uniting with both the backyard and secure swimming pool area, this outdoor zone puts the foundations in place for terrific outdoor living. Youll love spending the summer months outside, with the kids splashing in the pool or playing freely in the generous yard. With the back fence bordering a large easement, there is a wonderful sense of peace and quiet.
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite with shower, single vanity, and toilet. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom that boasts a combined shower/spa bath. The laundry and separate toilet complete the layout.
Ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, and ceiling fans provide modern comfort.
The enclosed single lock-up carport offers secure parking, while two garden sheds provide ample storage.

Description:
GREAT LOCATION
We have pleasure in presenting this Brick Veneer Unit, with open parkland and nature reserve next door, short walk to Village Centre, local transport, schools and more. This freshly painted two bedroom unit is perfect for downsizer or investor.
With open plan living the bay window allows loads of natural light to the newly carpeted lounge. Dining area which has the benefit of ducted heating and split system. A well appointed kitchen with wall oven, gas range, plenty of bench space and cupboards to help you cook up a storm.
The court yard offers outdoor living, with all weather bistro blinds, rain water tank, garden shed, single under roof garage and has a fully fenced court yard.
Come and see for yourself. I look forward to meeting you at the open times.

Description:
SOUGHT AFTER QUIET COURT
Located in a tightly held, quiet court location in Drysdale is this delightful three bedroom home. This residence has a spacious open plan living space with the kitchen overlooking two light filled living areas, a study/play room (with scope to be converted into a fourth bedroom if required) and secure, private rear yard. The roomy master bedroom has an ensuite and shelved WIR and the remaining two bedrooms have built in robes. With gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, a spa bath, a fresh coat of paint and too many features to list - this property really needs to be seen to be appreciated. So whether you are a retiree, family, new home buyer or investor book an inspection today.
What do you know about this historic town of Drysdale or the immediate area? Do you need to get to Melbourne to work? The ferry from Portarlington to Docklands is only 10 minutes down the road with no problem parking the car for the day. The choice of the many wineries, restaurants and even a whiskery means that socialising with family and friends will find you never running out of places to visit and try.
Drysdale itself is currently undergoing some major progress changes with the Bypass well under way for a mid-2020 completion.
Schooling in the area offers Public, Catholic and Christian primary and secondary options. With a population well balanced between families and retirees the community gels very well together.
Our SpringDale Neighbourhood Centre will answer all your new to the area questions. Everything you need to survive day to day is here in this place.

Description:
The Ideal project in a great location!
Sitting on 613m2 this 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home would make an ideal project for those with renovating know how. Located in a lovely pocket of Leopold and close to everything this really is a fantastic opportunity to take on a project for strong capital growth. The current owners have decided not to pursue a renovation and are very keen to sell and are prepared to meet the market. The layout has the lounge/ dining room at the front of the home featuring a Coonara style wood fire. Around the corner is the kitchen and dinette. From here you can access the rear yard with cubby, garage and lawn. To the rear is the bedrooms and bathrooms one of which has been renovated. Outside is a large rear yard with garage and lawn area. So if you're looking for great value and are prepared to do the work this could be the one and definitely worth a closer look!

Description:
Substantial Family Home in Quiet Court
Don't judge this book by its cover come along and inspect to appreciate the options ! Vendor keen to negotiate all reasonable offers. This large family home perfect for the growing family on 735m2. Nestled in a quiet court and adjacent to a treed reserve. Plenty of yard space for the kids to play. This home provides the option for the new owner to work from home or accommodate an extended family arrangement. Living areas are spacious with garden views from several rooms. Five generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes, two living areas and two separate bathrooms - this is a substantial home. Outdoor undercover area, chook house, vege garden and storage/workshop for all the garden tools.
Situated close to public transport, schools, shopping and the relaxing lifestyle choices of the Bellarine. Inspect now !

Description:
THIS HOME HAS SO MUCH, Its all about the Feel !!!
No. 9 has that special feel with vitality and colour that warms the soul. The solar passive inclination gives warmth and light to all three living areas, loads of flexibility with the front lounge allowing for spacious living/dining, maybe even a library. A light filled sitting room adjacent to the well designed kitchen, dining and third living, all overlooking the mature gardens and undercover entertaining patio with pizza oven . A study, four generous bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR, others have BIR'S, bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete the floor plan. Features include central heating, split system, ducted vac., ceiling fan, pantry , walk in linen, dishwasher and more. Double garage with tandem to rear yard and shed. The 720 SQM provides a lush and mature garden, offering fruit trees and many delights for the kitchen table. All of these wonderful features and within walking distance of the village amenities, medical, schools, shops and park lands , you will not do better.

Description:
Dreaming of a Rural Lifestyle
If you have been dreaming of a rural lifestyle but would still like the close proximity to the coast, schools and shops, then this is what you have been waiting for. Tucked away on the outskirts of Drysdale on the Bellarine Peninsula, this picturesque property features an expansive sugar gum plantation and the remainder of the property contains majestic gum trees, wattles and an assortment of native flora and fauna as well as two dams. Set on Approx 10 hectares (Approx 25 Acres), there is the potential to build your own dream home or resurrect, renovate and extend the original Miners cottage. This property offers the best of both worlds. The large acreage gives you the feeling of being away from it all, but within minutes you can be on the beach, in Geelong or on the ferry to Melbourne. Zoned farming, the area is renowned for its fertile soil and there is plenty of scope for horse agistment and other hobby farming possibilities. Close by are several of the regions award winning wineries, restaurants and the Curlewis Golf Club. An idyllic lifestyle is guaranteed.
